headline: Is Delta Air Lines (DAL) Offering Value After Mixed Share Price Performance?
summary: If you are wondering whether Delta Air Lines shares are offering good value at around US$68.95, it helps to step back from the headlines and look at what the numbers are actually saying. The stock has had a mixed run, with a 0.7% return over the last 7 days, a 4.3% decline over the last 30 days, a 0.2% decline year to date, and a 2.9% return over the last year, while the 3 year and 5 year returns sit at 80.0% and 84.0% respectively.
